statements: SELECT * FROM alert_customization;
SELECT alert_name, metric_type FROM alert_customization WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT email_recipients FROM alert_customization WHERE threshold > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM alert_customization ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(threshold) AS max_threshold FROM alert_customization;
SELECT alert_id, alert_name, metric_type, threshold, email_recipients, creation_date FROM alert_customization WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alert_customization WHERE metric_type = 'CPU' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT alert_name, threshold FROM alert_customization WHERE threshold > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM alert_customization WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01' AND email_recipients LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT alert_id, alert_name, creation_date FROM alert_customization WHERE email_recipients IS NOT NULL ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_budget_variances;
SELECT alert_id, alert_name FROM alerts_for_budget_variances WHERE threshold_amount > 1000;
SELECT alert_name, alert_type FROM alerts_for_budget_variances WHERE threshold_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM financial_milestones ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, completion_status FROM financial_milestones WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_name, threshold_amount FROM alerts_for_budget_variances WHERE threshold_amount > 1000 ORDER BY threshold_amount DESC;
SELECT alert_name, alert_type FROM alerts_for_budget_variances WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_name ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, target_date FROM financial_milestones WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY target_date ASC;
SELECT alert_name, threshold_amount, alert_type FROM alerts_for_budget_variances WHERE alert_type = 'Warning' ORDER BY threshold_amount ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, target_date, completion_status FROM financial_milestones WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY milestone_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM budget_alerts WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_milestones ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_target FROM financial_milestones WHERE milestone_target < 5000;
SELECT event_id, alert_timestamp, alert_details FROM alert_history ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM budget_alerts ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_target FROM financial_milestones WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, alert_timestamp, alert_details FROM alert_history WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT alert_type, budget_amount, variance_threshold FROM budget_alerts WHERE variance_threshold > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM financial_milestones ORDER BY milestone_target DESC, completion_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAlerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_name, description FROM BudgetAlerts;
SELECT alert_name, created_date FROM BudgetAlerts WHERE threshold_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FinancialMilestones ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, email FROM AlertSubscribers WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAlerts ORDER BY created_date DESC, threshold_amount ASC;
SELECT alert_name, description FROM BudgetAlerts WHERE threshold_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AlertSubscribers WHERE notification_type = 'Email' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT alert_name, description, created_date FROM BudgetAlerts WHERE threshold_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT a.alert_name, s.subscriber_name, ah.alert_timestamp FROM BudgetAlerts a JOIN AlertHistory ah ON a.alert_id = ah.alert_id JOIN AlertSubscribers s ON ah.subscriber_id = s.subscriber_id ORDER BY ah.alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAlerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_name, threshold_amount FROM MilestoneAlerts WHERE milestone_type = 'Financial';
SELECT * FROM AlertReceipts ORDER BY receipt_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, alert_name, read_status FROM BudgetAlerts WHERE threshold_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAlerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_name, threshold_amount FROM MilestoneAlerts WHERE milestone_type='financial';
SELECT alert_name, milestone_date FROM MilestoneAlerts ORDER BY milestone_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM AlertReceipts JOIN BudgetAlerts ON BudgetAlerts.alert_id = AlertReceipts.alert_id WHERE BudgetAlerts.threshold_amount > 1000;
SELECT UserProfiles.username, AlertLogs.log_message FROM UserProfiles JOIN AlertLogs ON UserProfiles.user_id = AlertLogs.alert_id WHERE AlertLogs.log_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
